quotes.message: The function of education is to teach one to think intensively and to think critically. Intelligence plus character - that is the goal of true education.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.message: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Education is the key to unlock the golden door of freedom.
quotes.name: George Washington Carver

quotes.message: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
quotes.name: John Dewey

quotes.message: Education is the movement from darkness to light.
quotes.name: Allan Bloom

quotes.message: The whole purpose of education is to turn mirrors into windows.
quotes.name: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.message: Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats the beauty and the youth.
quotes.name: Chanakya

quotes.message: The purpose of education is to replace an empty mind with an open one.
quotes.name: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.message: The goal of education is the advancement of knowledge and the dissemination of truth.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: Education is an admirable thing, but it is well to remember from time to time that nothing that is worth knowing can be taught.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: The direction in which education starts a man will determine his future in life.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: Education is learning what you didn't even know you didn't know.
quotes.name: Daniel J. Boorstin

quotes.message: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
quotes.name: William Butler Yeats

quotes.message: Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence.
quotes.name: Robert Frost

quotes.message: Education is our passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to the people who prepare for it today.
quotes.name: Malcolm X

quotes.message: Without education, we are in a horrible and deadly danger of taking educated people seriously.
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: Education is the kindling of a flame, not the filling of a vessel.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: No man who worships education has got the best out of education.... Without a gentle contempt for education no man's education is complete.
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: The aim of education should be to teach us rather how to think, than what to think rather to improve our minds, so as to enable us to think for ourselves, than to load the memory with thoughts of other men.
quotes.name: Bill Beattie

quotes.message: Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Education is a better safeguard of liberty than a standing army.
quotes.name: Edward Everett

quotes.message: The object of education is to prepare the young to educate themselves throughout their lives.
quotes.name: Robert Maynard Hutchins

quotes.message: He who opens a school door, closes a prison.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: Education is a progressive discovery of our own ignorance.
quotes.name: Will Durant

quotes.message: Education is an ornament in prosperity and a refuge in adversity.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Education is simply the soul of a society as it passes from one generation to another.
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: Education: the inculcation of the incomprehensible into the indifferent by the incompetent.
quotes.name: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.message: Education is the process of driving a set of prejudices down your throats.
quotes.name: Martin H. Fischer
